items.headline: Trump-Putin meeting: Here’s what their summit in Alaska could mean for oil prices
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump is due to meet Friday in Alaska with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Crude-oil prices surged when Russia invaded Ukraine in 2022, and there is a potential for sizable moves depending on how Friday’s summit goes.
